channel.title: Prague on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Prague on Damien Saunders

item.title: What a week – In Prague
item.description: So much has been happening and this just has to sum it up … here I am on the Charles Bridge in Prague (locals call it the Karluv most) … Ended up in Prague as I’m currently working with the team at Oskar Mobile who are launching Vodafone live! in 2006. Yes – I’m back at Vodafone looking after companies launching live for the first time. Luckily that means I get to travel to these places too … thanks to work!
